Articles.Content:
Hi guys, been playing around with making smaller rockets, however starting to have an orbital debris problem.

Looking for designs for small, fast, agile rockets which are able to intercept these items and either grab them or push them into orbital decay.

Most are Kerbin-orbiting, but if able to intercept Mun and Minmus is bonus!

Thanks,

Sam
Ask me! I am working on a little lander!
